routes.name: getDeviceTokenBasic
routes.description: Get token for device via key, serial, and secret.

routes.name: setBatchedCommandInstancesAsExecuted
routes.description: Set a collection of batched command instances as executed.

routes.description: Get the MQTT broker address.

routes.name: reportAlreadyExecutedCommands
routes.description: Report an already executed set of commands to the server.

routes.name: setCommandInstanceAsExecuted
routes.description: Report that a command has been executed to the server.

routes.name: getCommandTypeListEmbedded
routes.description: Get a list of available command types.

routes.name: getCurrentTimestamp
routes.description: Get the current server time in epoch (unix) time.

routes.name: getDataTypeListEmbedded
routes.description: Get a list of available data types.

routes.name: updateDeviceChannel
routes.description: Update device channel.

routes.name: createDeviceCommandInstanceEmbedded
routes.description: Create a command instance via a device.

routes.name: postData
routes.description: Post data to the cloud.

routes.name: upsertDeviceSettings
routes.description: Upsert settings for a device.

routes.name: getDeviceUnexecutedCommandInstanceList
routes.description: Get a list of unexecuted command instances for a device.

routes.name: uploadDeviceLogs
routes.description: Upload zip file of device logs.

routes.name: getDeviceTypeFirmwareRecord
routes.description: Get a desired version of a firmware record for a given device type.

routes.name: getPublicCloudKey
routes.description: Get base64 encoded public key from the server for use in RSA scheme.

routes.name: getMe
routes.description: Get information about the device.

routes.description: Get a list of available notifications.

routes.description: Set notification instance inactive.

routes.description: Get a list of available setting types.
